resources.string:
GPU Voltage Control App for the Samsung Galaxy S4.

 Created by the AlaskaLinuxUser.

 https://thealaskalinuxuser.wordpress.com

 Apache 2.0 License

 May work with other kernels that support KToonsez's GPU voltage control, but designed for the AKLU kernel for the S4 family of phones.
GPU voltage adjustments are inherently dangerous! \n\n Proceed at your own risk!
